channel.title: How do I change the gameframe on PI?
channel.description:
How do I change the PI gameframe? I want it to be older. Like #474, where it looks like a crumble paper around the edges.
If its handled through the sprites, can someone give me #474 gameframe sprites? If not, can you tell me how to change it?
-Thanks.

item.title: How do I change the gameframe on PI?
item.dc:creator: @Level_120_Dungeoneer Level 120 Dungeoneering
item.description:
@Level_120_Dungeoneer wrote:

Yeah, I prefer the old gameframe.

Do you have the #474 Gameframe Sprites?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the gameframe on PI?
